pycdf.lib - Access to CDF library¶

spacepy.pycdf.lib¶

Module global Library object.

Initalized at pycdf load time so all classes have ready access to the CDF library and a common state. E.g:

>>> from spacepy import pycdf
>>> pycdf.lib.version
    (3, 3, 0, ' ')
